# LayerRendererConfigurationError.unsupportedTrackingAreasFormat

**Case**

An error that indicates the layer doesn’t support the current pixel format for tracking areas textures.

## Declaration

```swift
case unsupportedTrackingAreasFormat
```

## Discussion

Compare the value the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_layer_renderer_configuration_get_tracking_areas_format] function returns and make sure it matches one of the values the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_layer_renderer_capabilities_supported_tracking_areas_format] function returns.
title: LayerRendererConfigurationError.unsupportedTrackingAreasFormat
